attributes.action: provide the bloke that says 'Mind The Gap' at Bank Tube Station with a day off
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I've written to Mayor Boris Johnson about this already. The poor bloke doesn't even get a lunch break. I'd be willing to stand in for him for a bit, I've been practising in front of my bathroom mirror. I think commuters will love the version I do whilst pinching my nose; it's a right hoot

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
